entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:38 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 07:38 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
